articles.title: Beijing threatens response to 'unacceptable' COVID testing on passengers from China - CTV News
articles.description: The Chinese government sharply criticized COVID-19 testing requirements imposed on passengers from China and threatened countermeasures against countries involved, which include the U.S. and several European nations.
articles.content:
